CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starfall Organics relative to Golden Harvest Cooperative?
SRP.A: Starfall Organics is {below} Golden Harvest Cooperative in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Farms relative to Ironwood Ranch?
SRP.A: Sunstone Farms is {below} Ironwood Ranch in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Ranch relative to Whispering Willows Estate?
SRP.A: Ironwood Ranch is {above} Whispering Willows Estate in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironwood Ranch}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Golden Harvest Cooperative}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Riverbend Plantation's maximum Crop Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Riverbend Plantation's maximum Crop Yield is in {2001}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starfall Organics's maximum Crop Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starfall Organics's maximum Crop Yield is in {1999}.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1992, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 1988 and 1989?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 1983 and 1992 was {lower} than between 1988 and 1989.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1995, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 1990 and 2000?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 1991 and 1995 was {lower} than between 1990 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2000, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 1995 and 1999?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 1999 and 2000 was {higher} than between 1995 and 1999.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1995, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 1991 and 1992?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 1986 and 1995 was {lower} than between 1991 and 1992.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Ironwood Ranch} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Whispering Willows Estate and Riverbend Plantation first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Whispering Willows Estate and Riverbend Plantation first exchanged leading positions in {1984}.
